text: Gabrielle Stone (born November 20, 1988) is an American actress and dancer. She is known for various movies and television series such as Speak No Evil, the movie Cut and the upcoming movie The Legacy Of Avril Kyte with actors Doug Jones, J. Larose and Dave Vescio. Gabrielle Stone has also worked on the film set with actors Billy Zane, Mischa Barton and Stone's mother Dee Wallace in Zombie Killers: Elephant's Graveyard. ==Biography== Stone was born in Los Angeles, the daughter of actor Christopher Stone and actress Dee Wallace. While growing up in Los Angeles, California, Gabrielle Stone studied different types of dance. She studied dance at the Ciara Dance studio in Woodland Hills, California where she is an alumna with more than 18 years of experience, she sought out training from some of the top instructors in California and studied dance for many years while growing up. Later in life Gabrielle decided to try out acting which became her career choice.
